headline: Co-Founder at Finku (YC W22)
summary:
I live in the intersection of business strategy & technology, solving complex problems that provide a positive difference to individuals and households.

Currently, I'm a co-founder at a fintech start-up, Finku, where our vision is to democratize finance in Indonesia.

Previously, I was a consultant at BCG where I have had exposure in detailing out strategic roadmaps & in incubating start-up concepts for large corporates, collaborating closely together with BCG Digital Ventures, a corporate investment and incubation firm. 

Growing up in Indonesia and having the privilege to study at Berkeley, I've grown to be passionate about financial inclusion, waste management, and sports. I'm always looking for ways to spend my time in areas I'm passionate about to empower & provide hope to every individual.

Feel free to contact me at reinaldo@finku.id to connect!

accomplishment_honors_awards.description: The Dean's Honors List recognizes outstanding academic achievement each fall and spring semester. Requirements include completing 12 or more letter-graded units in that semester; a semester and overall GPA in the top 10% of all College of Engineering undergraduates.
